author: Vicktor Hutama
comment: Good app, but got an app-breaking bug. Basically I got to the screen where I need to choose using Google Voice or not. I can't press next if I don't choose Google Voice, but I'm outside US/Canada.  Also, when I press next after selecting "use google voice" the app will crash and I have to redo the tutorial again (still same error). Can't even enter the main app. The voice command "send whatsapp ..." is somehow working, but I keep randomly getting the sample popup on setup/tutorial that I have to swipe. If the issue is fixed, it will be an easy 5/5

reply.author: joaomgcd
reply.content: Does it help if you select to not use Google Voice even if it's already selected?

author: Srinivas Tamang
comment: I paid for removing add but still the add pops up all the time

author: Marcos Abreu
comment: hi Joao, is there a way to change te default language other than doing it manually one by one?

author: Omar Ashour
comment: So, the app as a concept is great. I can't speak much for any features but Tasker integration, and it works wonderfully with WhatsApp.  However, in Android oreo, this app is obliterating my battery. It accounts for over 30% of my total usage, even though it literally runs through Tasker only once a day in the morning to send 2 messages. I'm not sure what's going, and I hope this gets fixed soon so I can change my review.

reply.author: joaomgcd
reply.content: Does rebooting your device help with that?

comment: this app is not working and i want to uninstall it but it cant

reply.author: joaomgcd
reply.content: Please follow the in-app instructions to uninstall.

author: Narsingh Metta
comment: Hi can you help to uninstall app

author: Columbcille Dougherty
comment: yes it does work now i noticed last night! thank you very much sir! its a great app!  The app does as it says, using voice commands and text to speech your messages are read to you and wait for a reply to almost any messaging app. you have the option of it reading automatically or  choosing to listen, as well as having it read back your reply! a MUST HAVE for people who struggle with texting and driving!

author: John Apple II
comment: This app is awesome, the only thing I'm trying to figure out now is how to link up a variable to send message text. Thanks for the great app, Dev!  Edit: Found out its an issue in AutoPebble, not Touchless chat, I'll send a note on that one.
title: Fun app!

author: Brett L
comment: Giving a poor review because you say you can't uninstall the app is in very poor taste as it CLEARLY states that you have to disable Administrative permissions prior to uninstalling. Also using Tasker plug ins requires a bit of experience and trial and error. There is a lot of good info out there just Google how to use Tasker and stop blaming the dev for your lack of knowledge.

author: Connor Doherty
comment: Cons: Randomly doesn't work. Log doesn't always show why a message was ignored. Very heavy when it does work, tends to bring a busy phone to a crawl. Poor documentation. Inconsistent design. The insistence on aligning app messages with phone contacts is unintuitive and time consuming. Smart repliers glitchy, trying to make one based on WiFi gives me "WiFi error: Can't find wifi networks" so they're rather useless. Tapping the help button brings up a Dropbox file not found page.  Pros: usually gets the job done, and with more options than the others out there. Has a lot of potential.

author: Jose Martins
comment: For God's sake, do you idiots realize that you have to disable ADMIN Privileges BEFORE UNINSTALLING... and this is due to ANDROID SECURITY NOT THE DEVELOPER. Holy crap! If you don't understand what that is, you should run away from any app that requires an IQ higher than 3!

author: Gustav Abrahamsson
comment: This is a great app! But there is one thing I'd like to have added. I would like to be able to send a message containing what is in the clipboard. This would make it much more customizable using together with tasker. Thanks for an otherwise great app!

author: Joji Jose
comment: I purchased the ad free version of the app.. In Tasker I'm not able to change settings of auto reply.. It keeps crashing.. Pls fix this.. Using Android 7 on nexus 6p.

reply.author: joaomgcd
reply.content: Thank you. I'll contact you directly with a fix!

title: Good work but still

author: Rafael Americano
comment: Gosto muito dos seus apps, João, mas este infelizmente não funciona muito bem. Além de merecer uma boa repaginada gráfica pra ficar mais de acordo com os outros da série auto. O design dele me parece um pouco amador.

author: Csalad Kiss
comment: 1. After purchased tasker plugin still shows ads. 2. whatsapp - only the first message reacheble in tasker plugin, cant use to read messages, because always read the same message  fix it, and it will be 5 star

author: Matias Larson
comment: Didn't even want the voice functions, but I installed this app as an easier way to automate sending a Hangouts message with Tasker...except it doesn't work for that either

author: Neha Deepak Kataria
comment: Very disappointed.....i want uninstal d app but diz doesn't work

author: Bhaswardeep Sikdar
comment: It sucks!!

author: Stefan Koshy
comment: Doesn't seem to work with Facebook Messenger after the new update to its interface.

author: Mike Richard
comment: Great developer but app not working on my device, with Marshmallow, I found another comment similar no response.  Contacted the developer responded I responded with a log with error and still no response will update review if I get some feedback

author: ANG
comment: You will not be able to remove or disable the app once you download it..  Seems very fishy..  Be careful guys..
title: Scam

comment: This has got to be one of the worst implemented apps I have ever used. It asks me if I want to read a message, I say yes, then it dings like I didn't say anything, and then does nothing. I remember 5 years ago when Microsoft figured out the best implementation of touchless messaging. I don't understand why Google hasn't done something like this and apps like this are no help in that regard.
title: It's a great idea but it doesn't work

author: G Roberts Jr
comment: Touchless Chat is great. I love sending messages without even having to touch my device. Really neat. Thanks to the Dev for the hard work involved. People, please read instructions to uninstall app if needed. It's really easy and simple, so please give Dev proper rating. This is an awesome app once you start using it!
title: Great App

author: jin l
comment: While I use this app and it works alright, there are still Ads in the paid version.  This is on a fresh reset device after I installed it and got the " you are now running an unlocked version of touchless chat'  popup.   if you go to use the plugin in tasker , specifically Send Message, there is still an AD on top.

author: El Efe
comment: Need a way to turn it off in a pinch,  I have been embarrassed several times,  dont need it on at all times, not user friendly,  no support
title: How do you turn it OFF,

author: Joseph Levy
comment: Unable to enable Accessibility option... which appears to be required to use any of the menus.  Can't access Settings or anything.  Galaxy S6 running 5.1.1
title: Will update rating when fixed

author: kulimboy
comment: Create a tasker to auto save whatsapp message to google calendar but when message received, this app still popup and asking permission to read it and then tasker save to google calendar. How to disable this while tasker profile is enable?

reply.author: joaomgcd
reply.content: You can disable automatic replies in the main app. :) Please contact me if you have any further questions.

author: Paul James Muldoon
comment: Please fix. Device HTC One m8 GPE stock. Fails to read or respond texts but does announce them still.
title: Broken on Marshmallow!!

author: Glenn Platkin
comment: Can't uninstall,it's annoying,it's has too many ads and you can't stop this thing and instructions to deinstall do not work, do not install
title: Warming

author: Saurabh Rathore
comment: I use it with tasker and I just wish it had an option to add more than one set of text strings in the Message received section so that it becomes more awesome.
title: Amazing application. Lightning fast response.

author: Paul FLAD - EDWARDS
comment: Not working for me! After purchasing, adds still pop up!

author: Kalpesh Prajapati
comment: Please tell me how to uninstall from mobile. please help me daveloper
title: How to uninstall

author: Diego Naya Lazo
comment: Needs more work. We will wait for it to evolve a little more.
title: Not yet there

author: Venkata Ramana Reddy
comment: Could you please give guidelines for adding new messaging application.

author: Varun Batra
comment: Doesn't work

author: Ceci Flores
comment: How do you delete this thing from the phone??????
Work beautifully with tasker
title: Brilliant App

author: Sherwin Facun
comment: After a few emails to the developer, he has yet to provide a fix where the ads keep coming back after I've already donated. This app doesn't play nicely with lucky patcher installed. I should be able to have whatever app I want on my device if I support their work.
title: Can't disable ads

author: Daniel Koenen
comment: Amazing. I can leave my tablet on my desk and it automatically reads messages without me even having to have the screen on. I reply without turning things on and its just a really great program. It does foul up with "to continue google needs to use your contacts" message here and there, ive authorized it so many times but still the same. Five stars for concept, but 4 stars for this issue I hope I or someone could figure out a fix, forums haven't found me anything. This developer is amazing though.

author: Jarkko Siltamäki
comment: This is yet another great app from this developer. I've already enjoyed his AutoVoice app with Tasker. However, this app is lacking severely on in the languages available, and I don't really understand why. The list of languages is far from what Google Now actually supports, making the app currently pretty much useless for me.
title: Great with problems in languages
